Subject: How to Start Up....and Keep Your Webcomic Going!
Description: Do you like Webcomics? Do you read webcomics? Have you ever wanted to start one of your own? Join Laura Cascos and her partners from the 7+ year running webcomic Sidekick Girl and BluRaven C. Houvener, writer and illustrator of the 3+ year running webcomic It's Just Another Day as they take you through tales of how they started up, got out there, and kept it going....and more importantly, how you can too!  Speakers include:BluRaven Houvener, Laura Cascos, Erika Wagner - Track: Webcomics  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: You...You Don't Like My Webcomic?
Description: Sadly it happens to us all at one time or another...and people aren't always so kind about it! Join Laura Cascos and Erika Wagner (the team behind the amazing Webcomic Sidekick Girl), BluRaven C. Houvener (writer and illustrator of It's Just another day), and Jon David (creative force behind the novel series Morgalla) as they walk you through the ins and outs of how to cope with criticism and survive to create another day!    Speakers include:BluRaven Houvener, Laura Cascos, Erika Wagner  - Track: Webcomics  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector
